resources.string: The button below goes to the user package (bm.it.mobile.sample.user), you can see a simple sample that uses LiveData with Coin and MVVM architecture
The button below goes to the rest package (bm.it.mobile.sample.rest), you can see a simple sample that uses Retrofit, Coroutines, LiveData and MVVM architecture
The button below goes to the room package (bm.it.mobile.sample.room), you can see a simple sample that uses ROOM, Coroutines, LiveData and MVVM architecture
The button below goes to the coroutines package (bm.it.mobile.sample.coroutines), you can see a simple sample that uses Coroutines, LiveData and MVVM architecture
